title: How to Remove Onion Smell from Pans

steps.headline: Scour the pans with common salt.
Place the pans on the stove until the salt is brown.
Dry.
steps.description: The pans should now smell neutral.

text: Washing and dry the pans.  Scour the pans with common salt.  Place the pans on the stove until the salt is brown.  Shake often.  Wash the pans as usual.  Dry. The pans should now smell neutral.
